title: Yi vs Wu
body:
Hey all, this is my first post here, and first League of Legends fanart.

I have always been a big fan of {{champion:11}} . He was my first main, and even to this day {{champion:11}}  and {{champion:62}}  are my top two favorites. I also love how the two Wuju Style warriors are connected in lore. I was aiming for something like their training grounds - the master and pupil battling it out.

I started this as a doodle in class, so I drew from memory and totally didn't get their armors and weapons right. Later when I brought it in Photoshop I decided to stick to my own designs. As long as they are recognizable I will be happy.

I hope you all like it.

Update: As promised, [here](http://i.imgur.com/rFxRSsi.jpg) is a high-res version.

replies.body:
Hahah, cool! Totally recognizable by me! Keep up the Wuju style! 
{{champion:11}} {{champion:62}}
This is so cool! The green background really makes Yi pop and Wu's placement does the same for him. I think you could define the sword a little more, bu ti love this! Great energy.
Thanks! I know what you mean. I started with a low contrast style and kept pushing as I progressed. Next time I will try more of a metallic look.
Do some more wuju arts there sick!{{champion:11}}
Yi is really good  for something done out of memory. And I love the art style! Well done.
Thanks! I don't think I can pull off a realistic one. Instead, I think it'd be interesting to try other champs in this style.
Aahhh I love how you did Wukong. This is awesome!

yea this looks awseome dude good job.

this is the kind of picture i would use as a background on my laptop :D
They are 100% recognizable, nicely done art piece Vashkor!
Thanks all! I am really happy that many are liking this. I will post a 6000x4000 version for those of you who want it as a wallpaper. :)
